entry.title: 3月22日记录
entry.content:
3月22日记录

正午,柔和的日光照在窗台上,悠悠惠风和畅。不知怎的,我突然想到八角塘老家门前的站台,某一年夏日,在屋中翻出一本背背佳使用手册,我在站台上,阳光下,有模有样的做着米字操……现在门前杂草长起来了罢。那棵桃树还在吗?斜前面那一畦地水杉长得怎样了？

吊床
二年级时,隔壁邻居送我一幅吊床,网状,酒红色,大概是尼龙纤维,那天下午(傍晚),在后门功名楼旁公厕边两棵之间栓上吊床,我第一次睡上吊床。后来又在阳台上两座水塔之间,那几年暑假中,我倒也不嫌热,吃冰棍,拿湿毛巾盖脸,度过一个个下午。三年级某下午,我躺在吊床上,面朝蓝天,看过一片片云彩,欲求一架遥控直升飞机，后在那年生日当天,得此,可惜并没有玩上几小时,就有几处损坏,换成别物……10岁那年生日,场面真够隆重的……三、四年后,由于吊床未经妥善收纳保管,风吹日晒,稍一使劲就会断裂,后终归尘埃。阳台边门柜上还有残留此吊床的残渣吗?
初二时,我又得到一幅新的吊床,鲜艳的浅绿色,布状,却也十分透气,现代化,在姥爷家门前,八角塘老家后院均有所使用。22年暑假,我在衣橱架和窗框上栓好吊床,听着广播,看看书,
好不惬意…
(全鱼、王八,巴西龟、兔子,蚕)

entry.title: 回忆与印象
entry.content:
回忆与印象

引子:被酒莫惊春睡重,赌君消得泼茶香。当时只道是寻常。

关于此篇文章,我本可不必再写,我现在既然可以写出来,往后想必也并非可以忘却,与其留在纸上,不如記在心底。18日晚,4点左右醒来,许是受到梦境的影响(具体是何梦,现已无从知晓)想到很多事情,加之读罢简嫃《[徘徊]之一杂草吞咽了故事》,我就谋划着写这样一篇文章,遣词造句,辗转反侧,今日得此功夫遂写。
最先想到的是姥爷家的山,那时房子还在山腰上,顺着门旁山脊向上攀爬一段,右手边是一片盆地,平原,很宽广。思绪就此展开……许是能力欠缺,我无法通过几句话,通过纸笔表达我那时的感受与心境。又想到那一年拜年,跨过那座山的种种印象。
思绪继续扩散,我開始深挖在记忆底层的事件,很奇怪,我愈是聚焦某一个特定事件时,“视线”模糊,另一个无关的冒出来,打断我的思绪。依稀记得我5,6岁时,手拿着几支或一盒蜡笔,随妈妈穿过老街,这应是最早的我所记得的。
风会带走你存在过的证明,我不知在此记录这些有的没的事情有什么意义。我也不想奢求或想有一位读者,就像初中毕业的那年暑假,写了不少废话文学。高一时,遇到班级最漂亮的万雪艳小姐，使我兴奋地,忘情地拿给她看。前几天无意看到“我只是无条件…”与后来写给她的某篇相同,尽管已过去多年,却依然让我尴尬,恶心好久。对我而言,没有几位理想读者。别人也没有理由去浪费时间在这上,不善与他人交际,写这些权當弥补。
很多事情过去了就成了过眼云烟,譬如前天吃了什么菜,项目上有什么进展?我说不上来。我想抓住这些云烟,就通过Dayone写日记,写完之后也不会重阅,毕竟很普通,也都过去了。
此文题为《回忆与印象》倒没多少内容,毕竟太庞杂,想到这个忘了那个,临时起意,且记且写,就比停笔。（传单,广场、琉璃鲸）

entry.title: Some notes
entry.content:
Some notes

Java版本的iPhone-Bark我决定继续采用python版本的模式——即一个App.py文件引用多个page(tk.Tk)Frame，而转换页面的方式是Frame:pakc()与forget_pack(),Java版本中JFrame与之相同，转换页面却是setvisuable(),JFrame中窗口存在多个panel或单个，此项目只有一个JFrame，在sound_page.java中我遇到麻烦，在登录界面到主页面我的处理是一路向前的，不存在进入到主界面重新到login_page，但在用户选择完sound后必须返回main_page来send，故不可采用new main_page的方式，亦只能setvisuable。
我也不需要在sound_page中返回主页面的过程中传递Audio_Name参数，而是在Main_page中调用class sound_page中的函数，此函数返回其参数，亦不用考虑self作用域问题。
综上，处理在sound-page中返回到main-page避免new frame才是重中之重。

2：43PM
今天上午我写下上面这些亟待解决的问题，我还觉得是很大的，令人头疼的问题呢，下午我在搜素如何在两个方法中共用一个变量，现在再想觉得愚蠢，我在python中不止一次运用全局变量，在之前tiktok项目中和前面App.java 获取屏幕尺寸不都是吗。通过App.bark.setvisuable，我完美解决上述问题。

entry.title: Why I can’t leave game
entry.content:
Why I can’t leave game
I think my time is free, when I during the time I haven’t anything to do, maybe I’ll choose games. And I take so much time to achieve great games achievements so I can’t lose them. Let me busy, so that I have enough time to play games. For example, in December, January, I was taken myself in programming. And during spring festival, because I was free, felt bored, I touched games again. So from then on, I can’t leave games.

  • Let me busy
  • Don’t remember to play games

entry.title: Raising beans
entry.content:
Raising beans
On the morning of the 12th, I placed an order on Taobao. I got it last night and looked at the production date. Well, it’s March 10th, but only 4 days. The word “raising beans” came into contact with me the first time I bought coffee beans. Fortunately, Mantening, which was obtained on February 6, was produced on January 24. It should have passed the bean-raising period early. The fragrance is very strong, and I don’t have to endure the suffering of raising beans. The following two models are cheap and the dates are ambiguous, so they don’t care too much. But this time it’s very different. Obviously, the fragrance is not as good as the previous one. After consulting a number of articles on bean farming, there are different opinions, and they are wondering whether to open the seal tomorrow to solve the problem.

Logicably speaking, carbon dioxide can emit 60% in 4 days, and I also want to compare the hand-made results of fresh coffee beans. Therefore, I secretly decided to taste it in Kaifeng and have a quick look.

养豆

12日一早，我在淘宝上下单了之前喝的曼特宁，昨天晚上取得，看了一下生产日期，好吧，3月10日，不过仅仅4天。“养豆”一词在我第一次买咖啡豆就有所接触，好在2月6日取得的曼特宁于1月24日生产，应早早过了养豆期，香味很浓，不必忍受养豆的煎熬。后续两款因价格便宜，标注日期模棱两可，便也没有过多在意。可是这次大不相同。明显香味不及之前同款。查阅多篇关于养豆地文章资料，众说纷纭，纠结于明日是否开封以求解馋。
按道理说，4天二氧化碳可以排出60%，我也想比较新鲜咖啡豆的手冲结果。因此，我暗暗决定，开封浅尝，一睹为快。

entry.title: Homemade cottage latte
entry.content:
Homemade cottage latte

Limited by the restrictions of coffee utensils, I have been drinking by hand for the past month. After all, it is more or less illogical to extract at ordinary pressure, no oil, and adding milk bubbles. This morning, looking at the half bottle of leftover milk the day before, I thought about making milk bubbles by shaking. In practice, the milk bubbles are not dense. There are many large bubbles on the surface, but they are not easy to dissipate, so they are added to the hand-brewed coffee liquid, which has excellent taste.

自制山寨拿铁

受限于咖啡器具的限制，我近一个月来喝的都是手冲，毕竟常压萃取，没有油脂，加入奶泡，多少显得不合逻辑。今天早上，看着前一天喝剩的半瓶牛奶，想着通过摇晃产生奶泡，实践之，奶泡算不上绵密，表面许多大气泡，但好在不易消散，就加入到手冲咖啡液中，口感和味道极佳。

entry.title: 咖啡浅谈
entry.content:
咖啡浅谈

前几天分别在淘宝和抖音商城挑选了两款咖啡豆，分别是耶加雪菲和洪都拉斯雪莉，昨天将两款豆子取出并顺便买了一些方便面食品。吃完了手冲了一支雪莉的豆子，许是水温过高，初闻有强烈的威士忌，香草味，但是入口却是尖锐的酸。放凉后一股涩感。今天早上，强忍着不适灌下好几口，反胃，后剩一点实在难以忍受，倒了。我不知道是我的冲泡方法有问题还是豆子本身的问题。后来又冲泡了一壶耶加雪菲，不知怎么的，磨出来的咖啡粉研磨度极粗，湿香柑橘调明显，入口挺酸。放凉后毫无咖啡味，对我而言，不过是一杯小酸水。哎，这两款豆子只能说是尝鲜吧。就像茶叶中的花茶一样，我实在提不起好感。我更喜欢醇厚，有巧克力可可，带有少许烟熏感的豆子，譬如曼特宁。下次我一定会选择危地马拉的豆子或是曼特宁。50多元钱尝个鲜吧。有点肉疼。不要贪便宜买香精豆，浅烘的豆子，果酸味我着实欣赏不来。

entry.title: A brief talk about coffee
entry.content:
A brief talk about coffee

A few days ago, I selected two coffee beans in Taobao and TikTok Mall, namely Yega Sheffield and Honduran Shirley. Yesterday, I took out the two beans and bought some instant noodles by the way. After eating, I washed a pair of Shirley’s beans. Maybe the water temperature was too high. At first, I smelled strong whisky and vanilla, but it was sharp and sour in my mouth. There is a sense of astringency after cooling down. This morning, I endured the discomfort and took several mouthfuls, nausea, and the rest was really unbearable. I don’t know if there is something wrong with my brewing method or the beans themselves. Later, a pot of Yega Shefei was brewed. Somehow, the ground coffee powder was extremely thick, the wet citrus was obvious, and the mouth was quite sour. There is no coffee flavor after cooling. For me, it’s just a cup of sour water. Well, these two kinds of beans can only be said to be fresh. Just like the flower tea in the tea, I really can’t get a good impression. I prefer mellow beans with chocolate cocoa and a little smoky, such as Mantening. Next time I will definitely choose Guatemalan beans or Mantening. Try it for more than 50 yuan. It hurts a little. Don’t buy fragrant beans cheaply. I really can’t appreciate the light-baked beans and fruit-sour taste.

entry.title: Mandheling Coffee Hand Punch Parameter
entry.content:
Mandheling Coffee Hand Punch Parameter

  • Water temperature: 88-90℃
  • Powder amount: 15g

entry.title: Bedtime notes
entry.content:
Bedtime notes

I feel that I’m really sick these days. Yesterday, it was unusually sultry, and it suddenly approached 20 degrees Celsius. On the 16th, I went to Huoshan Xulu’s house to pay a New Year call, which is also the only one I’ve been to this year. To be honest, I really shouldn’t go to Lu’an and Huoshan with my aunt. The most worrying thing at the dinner table still happened. I’ve been drinking and vomiting since September. After that, I didn’t touch a drop of white wine, and I smothered more than half a glass of high-level wine in one mouthful. When I first entered my stomach, it brought strong discomfort. After that, it was difficult to swallow with a small mouthful. I left the table with Wang Xudong. As soon as I got on the car, I couldn’t help spit it out. It’s really a shame. In fact, there is no need to be a hero. Later, I climbed Guanyin Rock when I was drunk. It was hot, but I didn’t take off my jacket, so I got angry. Yesterday, the temperature was close to 20 degrees Celsius, and I only wore an autumn coat and a shirt. It was cold, and it was really not suitable to cover this kind of thick quilt at night. The cold and fire are uneven. I got up early this morning. I have no strength all over my body. My head is dizzy, and my throat is sore. I feel extremely uncomfortable. In addition, my parents have not exerted pressure in the past two days, and I am in a very bad mood.
Let’s go to Liu’an in a few days to change the environment and offset the feeling of comfortability after the Spring Festival. Java Swing development, etc.

睡前小记

我感觉这几天真的病了，昨天出乎寻常的闷热，骤然间接近20摄氏度，16号去霍山许璐家拜年，也是今年我唯一去过的一家，说实话我真的不应该随大姑爹去六安和霍山，饭桌上最担心的事情还是发生了，自九月份喝酒和吐了之后我是没有碰一滴白酒，一口也是闷了大半杯高度酒，初入肚就带来了强烈的不适，之后一杯小口抿着都难以下咽，随汪许东一起离桌，刚上车就控制不住吐了出来。实是羞愧。其实也不必逞英雄。后又在醉酒的情况下爬观音岩，热，我却没有脱下袄子，就这样火气就上来了。昨天气温接近20摄氏度，我就仅穿一件秋衣和外衬衫，寒，晚间确实不适合盖这种厚被子了。寒火不均，今天一早起来，浑身没有力气，脑袋昏沉，咽喉肿痛，难受至极，加上这两天父母有的没的施加压力，心情极差。
过几天去六安吧，改变一下环境，抵消年后带来的无所适从感。Java Swing开发等。

entry.title: Thunderstorm
entry.content:
Thunderstorm

Today is the ninth day of the first lunar month. The sky is gloomy, and the sound of people in the family is boiling, cooking, and walking. Sultry and depressing, I suddenly thought of the article “Thunderstorm”. The real New Year’s Eve is only a few days before New Year’s Eve. Hey, the New Year has passed like this. If time goes back…

I feel that I have something to deal with tonight. I will go my own way. The road is at my feet.

雷雨

今天是正月初九，天空阴沉沉的，家中人声鼎沸，炒菜声，步行声。闷热，压抑，我突然想到《雷雨》这篇文章，真正有年味的时间仅仅是除夕前几天，哎，年就这样过去啦。假如时光倒流……
今晚我感觉有点事情需要处理，走自己的路，路在脚下。

entry.title: Some experience with TiKTok Spider switch launguage from Python to Java
entry.content:
Some experience with TiKTok Spider switch launguage from Python to Java

On 17​th​ January, I don’t know why I got the idea of this operation, but magic is I did, with the cost of two days I achieved the function of using cookies to log into TikTok (DouYin) automatically, and today, I switched the ​web driver​ from local to selenium grid, but before this action, I also passed the try of connecting local chrome (debug mode), yeah, all is well besides I can’t operate mouse in ​chrome driver​. I saw the comment before I tried and knew this problem. So I switched ​Webdriver​ to selenium grid (Maybe just more like the version of Python), and then I processed that big bug (oh, maybe yesterday I had solved this problem), refactored code, and added some features, such as finding elements, write info to document, etc.
Now, I have committed two commitments to GitHub, and the features of the first phase were finished, during the next phase, I am supposed to add loops of getting information (Author, Content, Detail_Href), and get comments, the following action is beauty JSON data, etc.
Digest knowledge from websites daily carefully. Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish.

entry.title: Please be careful, when you’re coding
entry.content:
Please be careful, when you’re coding

Today I continue to develop the GUI Program Bark, and have added a new page --Verify_Page, but when I processed the App.py, and switched to other pages there always show the content of Verify_Page, so terrible, I took so much time to find where have wrong, finally, I found a bug in create tk.Label and Button, I was lost the parameter of ‘self’ point to tk.Tk(), just like the root, the root=tk.Tk(), so the result is they showing on App Window still when I switched a page.
If I can be careful when I am coding, this trouble won’t appear, I won’t spend so much time to locate error, then in the end I want to say again: please be careful and patient.

entry.title: If I review this past year, what was the best thing that happened each month
entry.content:
How time flying a new year will start, review this past year, all the things just like past in a sudden.

In January because Chinese New Year was on 21st January so before it, no special with other days, on 31st December of 2022 I was became the strongest king of game so the beginning of January I was played game.

About on tenth I got an iPhone 5s but it was locked so I was trying to jailbreak until 20th.


And on fifteenth of January, there was snow and may be the first snow of this day I went out of house and paid the phone bill I was so relaxed, the last days of 2022(of course I mean that was Chinese lunar calendar) I permed my curly hair and took a lot of photos in a sudden I found wow I was so handsome.


Then was Chinese New Year, after it about there has 7 or 8 days, I and my parents went to Chinese New Year greeting no special things, then on 28th January a relative of mine got married, I went to take a part in of marriage ceremony, I drank a lot, but that feeling was so fine.

Another thing I want to say is I meet a girl name is LijinWen, wow how huge change was made to her that I couldn’t recognize her. About her memory I just remember this same as on marriage ceremony , I and her was same as flower girl (laughing) of course I don’t know what is meaning that time and another time is we went to swim together. In that time, I found her was so beautiful but, in this time, I can say she is not maybe isn’t her. ok, whether or not please continue my review.
And then on 31st we went to Hefei do something, just these, a month was passed.

February

In February, the atmosphere of the New Year is slowly fading. All things
will become to the normal, at that time, I am enjoying the happiness by using VPN, and because of iPhone 5s, I first watch TikTok by using app and then created an account of google it goes without saying


On 11th February, I downloaded a game which I noticed in douying I am interested in it’s realistic, spent my whole night time then the remaining days of February maybe I usually played this game.

On 25th February, Maybe I ate the most delicious instant noodles during this whole year, there are fat shell rolls in instant noodles! Yummy！

The last days I was designed an Android app named “Yunt”, that’s most thing of February.

In March, I watched the TV Series that was popular at that time called 《KuangBiao》

And the most progress of my project is built my personal website with Django

Then i used the google account to sign up OpenAI but it’s last steps need to verify phone number the most problem it doesn’t support china mobile number, now I know such as GitLab and others website too, I have no idea just found a share account and as my wish I had used ChatGPT first time.
And then I wanted to have a look of Yi’s QQ Zone Albums, in fact I wanted to do that is on October 2022,But I tried so many ways, they’re don’t work. So the last to settle for a second best, save the website, This is also for me to develop object-c to local load html website on iPhone in the future.

On 30th March, I went to rural hometown with grandma and took a photo in the rice filled, and this photo became the last photo until June, because from then on, maybe 1st April, Dad confiscated my iPhone, so terrible.

March passed like this.

April

Now I am reviewing what I did in April with photo I took in Horror Mobile Phone, to be honest, if I haven’t found this phone, that’s impossible to take these photo so I need appreciate it(laughing) ok now let’s go, on 8th April I foundthis phone under the desk, first thing first, I logged in QQ, what shocked me was the photo took by my English teacher Mrs Wang when we will graduate are still saved, even though these photos not many include me, but I saved(Maybe these photos are only I have when Yi was junior high school student and maybe are most natural).


On 12th, I ate FuJian QianliXiang Chaos it also delicious and a cup of Latte, then I just watched so videos and played games, oh, on 18th, At a cost of cutting hair I ate a kinds of food, at the same time, I wrote a poem in note but now it was lost. On 25th, at morning I found a bucket of Chonghua cigarette by watching monitors, at afternoon, I sent my mom to cut tea and I got a cup of coffee, it’s so sweet, and at evening, my mom brought Chaos for me, but to my surprise she stolen that cigarette Gods doesn’t know it. I just can say NB. Most thing of April just these.

May

And then is May, there just one photo I can saved in Albums, so maybe that Honor Phone was also be confiscated, the only thing I can remember was the last days of May, maybe is the beginning of June, I watched the movie .

June

In June, finally, I haven’t to take the college entrance examination. How was feeling, I don’t know how to say. On 20th June it is a important day, I went to the same place of i took a photo of snow, and took a photo again, summer and winter, the difference between them can show it easily with two pictures, and I spent a whole afternoon time to use photoshop and processed it, I wanted to post a QQ dynamic, but finally I don’tmother fuck, this evening Yi deleted my contact of QQ, ok all thing was ended, this thing I wrote in document named .

July

And then is July, at the beginning of July I went to house of Lu’an with dad, grandma , and cousin.dad transferred me one hundred RMB to my Alipay, and at morning we have a look of movie 《she disappeared 》and at noon ate a bowl of beef noodles… I want to say this month and August I ate so much snail rice noodles(haha).

On 18th July we went to Beijing, visited some famous places but in fact we just go to most of free place, such as need make an appointment or charged place I didn’t goto there. The Great Wall is the first place we visited. In fact, I didn’t approve it.

Because of wedding ceremony we must went back before 25th maybe the true reason, I took some photos and posted to QQ said: “Follow the track of gale I am chasing the sun” at evening I was drunk again so with this feeling I add the contact of Yi and uncle recommended me go to join the army, so the beginning of August is all of these things. Additionally, July and August I bought so much beer with snail rice noodles.

August

In August, the start time I was lived in Lu’an house I admit: these days maybe the most comfortable life during this year. And on 11th, I needed to take a physical examination, because just myself I was so nervous that I putted my pees on the ground, how embarrassed. Mother fuck, it just hasen’t 20 days Yi deleted me again with a message: ” What are you always bothering about? Do you know that it’s annoying?” From then on about on 13th I went to Lu’an again…

September

September, my family both went to Lu’an, I ate dinner just myself, I ate snail rice noodles and drank beer again, but this time I added the wine, because of one video I drank a lot, of course I was drunk and drank most of bottle 42vol wine, finally I vomit, the whole room is full with this smell so terrible, from then on, I almost not eat snail rice noodles again, besides, dad confiscated my laptop now nothing I have just a PC and a powerless iPhone so I just played the game of GTA SA … but about on 22nd I got the laptop, and no long times I found the iPad and use charger of it to charge iPhone, now it still is. Then comes Middle Autumn Festival, they all came back. And I got a kind of tea called “ShouMei” now I am drinking it.

October

The October was coming, something big happened this month, because of my hand was cheap, change the permissions of Users, the result was most of operation need the Administrator Permissions, I have no idea just restore it, first try was failed, because I saved the settings, and second I just backup all data of drivers to PC a whole night time spent. The next day(2nd or 3rd on October ) I went to Lu’an with Auntie I was so tired so when I achieved just fall asleep. I was so scared when I tried to restore my laptop but when anything is finished I found the D and E drivers data is still saved, oh thank God. And then I deleted the virtual machine windows10 and install a real OS in G drive.


On 15th, I happened to read an article of NAS, and operated it, it was successful, so the next two month I just played the NAS, I wrote some articles about it.

November

November, continue the work of NAS and on 22nd I got a JetBrains Space, so I learned the knowledge of Git and developed some good tools,such as Aliyun Source Saver.

December

December, I used the replacement of ChatGPT to get more information about tkinter and built a GUI send program iPhone-Bark


That’s all my review of 2023, enjoy a new year time.

entry.title: Check Notebook
entry.content:
Check Notebook

Now, I have so many app or website to note something and express myself, include with Synology Notestation、Onenote、Dayone、Apple Journal、Apple Note, Evernote（domestic and international,and on the last night, i build a personal blog website(WordPress), that’s to say, I need to choose which app or website i should to express myself comfortably and suitably.

​Synology Notestation​: It’s similar with Apple Note and both of them is free it used to Note something I want to remmber, write quickly and maybe is temporary

​Day One​: More like Apple Journal,Write what happened during One Day, the best advantage of this App can note that day’s Weather, Location, Athletic State and so on, can include more detail and information of one day, it used to keep a diary

​OneNote​: Microsoft Software, depends on OneDrive, I can sync anything i made, used to copy the text i written in paper, make them more systematize.

​Evernote​: Independent of the above, I tried it in May 2022, at that time, i used it to note what i did during a day and add some coding information, but Synology Notestation just only support this, maybe it’s the reason now i am keep using it. And more, it doesn’t like day one, I can add photo, video, audio nolimit yeah, a good advantage.

​WordPress​: Personal Blog System, Someone use it to build personal WiKi, but i just use it to post my individual blog, now, it has program skill, life kinds

In the end: Sometimes, I thtik i make a note just for make it, to add numbers, and maybe it will waste time, but please remember, during summer vacation which it’s the last vacation of junior high school, i wrote so much and spent a lot of time, now, think back, what’s i can get from it? i can answer, but something is affects me in a subtle way.

entry.title: 人生处处皆有遺憾，驀然回首，青舟己過萬重山
entry.content:
人生处处皆有遺憾，驀然回首，青舟己過萬重山

記得那是8年前，暑假結束，高二下學期分班，哥们或绩有点下滑，从原本的尖子班调到平行班，新班主任挺開心的，但是对于我来說就是高興不起来，毕竟是降了一级，从原本别人仰望的存在，变成需要去仰望別人，失落感肯定是有的，尤其是班級后边卫生角，坐了几个看着就不像熱热学习的同学，莫名有点害怕。但是经过我一上午的观際，我发現这帮人的头頭竟是坐在我旁边的一个看起来人畜无害的女孩子，瓜子脸，五官长得特别致，长得小小的，然后这帮暂且称之为不良少年吧，每次下课都会围在我的桌子旁聊天，有个人我印象特别深刻，叫老刘，也是长得小小的，身上有一种浓烈的市井气息，但这人特别逗啊，以至于我后来一看到他就想笑，当然这是后话了。
分班第一天麼，没有课，就是班主任来介绍一个下新同学，然后分座位，发书。由于是住读生，提前一天来到学校，那天晚上我找不到班主任，不知道寝室在哪，正好懒得回家，去学校附近的网吧通了宵，反正第二天没有课，开了台电脑，看火影忍者，当时好像是刚刚更新到第四次忍界大战，看到四代火影跟带土打的那一場，帅得我一晚上没有睡着，就导制第二天到班上困得一批，困到放学都不想回宿舍那种，我就趴在桌子上睡觉了，不知过了多久，我迷迷糊糊就听見动静，然后我抬头看，我發现我的同桌坐在教室讲台，边充电边玩手机，好像是在跟别人聊天，笑出了聲，把我吵醒了。当时教室就我们两个人，她看到我也有点尴尬，收起手机出去了，我一看时间，我K，从中午12点睡到下午6点多，肚子餓了，上食堂吃饭，到食堂我發现她也在，和她一起吃饭的，就是我们班那幾個卫生角的同学，由于上午下课的时候，他们老来座位旁边聊天，我有点害怕，就把我的座位让出来给他们，自己去走廊站一站，我的这个举动也帶来了他们的好感，所有当我端着饭盆找座位的時候，他就跟我打招呼说：‘新英雄來了。主要是前两天英雄联盟刚好出了个新英雄，叫疾風劍聖亞索，我又是新来的，所以他们给我取了个外号就叫亚索，我也很配合，端着饭盆，“哈萨给”，然後其他人心领神会，模伤各种英雄技能语音和动作，来了一场别开生面的戰爭。我同桌看不懂，“你们干嘛呢？“老劉说这叫男人之间的默契，你懂个屁。说完我們哈哈大笑，给妹子整的有点无语。吃完饭老刘跟我说，老班把我分到他们寝室，他准备打完篮球再回宿舍，问我跟不跟他一起，我不会打，我说算了，想回教室坐一会，这时候我同桌说正好跟我一起回去，手机还在教室里充电，一路上我俩谁都没有说话，有点尴尬。当时满脑子就想着早点回到室，结果到了教室更尴尬，我啥也干不了，桌子上除了课本啥也没有。试问瘋了一个暑假，谁看得下去课本，这个时候我就看到她桌子上有本《龙族》，盯着看了好久，我当时心想还有女孩子喜欢看这个？同桌可能是注意到我这个眼神，把《龙族》递给我，你要看吗？”“这个我看过了，感觉有点血腥，我看到弟弟居然叫哥哥把它吃掉就没看了。”“合看你就看到第一章是吧。”“呵,没有没有,开玩笑开玩笑,我看完了。等更新呢,主要是没想到你们女孩子也喜欢看这种小说。“别人我不知道,反正我挺喜欢看的。”“下回出新版咱俩AA呗,一起看。”“行”。
当天晚上回寝室老刘很热情的给我安排床位,他是寝室长,还问我有没有被子啥的,给我介绍卫生间在哪,洗衣机怎么用等等。他这个劲一下就打破了我对于不良少年的固有认知,我原本觉得他社会气息比较浓重,应该待人不会很友善,但现在看来,他比大多数人情商更高,只是学习不好而已。
第二天上课,可能是前一天下午睡多了的原因,我早早起床,洗漱完毕来到班上，我发现有个人比我还早,就我那同桌,她鬼鬼祟祟蹲在讲台后边,给充电宝充电。学校不让带手机,宿舍也没有插座,唯一能充电的地方,就是学校多媒体讲台下边的电脑,她听到我开门给她下一跳啊,看到是我才给她放下心来。“你怎么来这么早。”我说我没事干我来看会书。然后就不说话了,气氛有一点尴尬,一直到早起铃声之后,陆陆续续有同学过来早读,我读着读着突然听到一阵歌声,我扭头一看,这同桌左手伸进袖子里捂住耳朵,右手拿着笔在本子上写着什么，嘴里还念念有词,那嘴型明显就不是在读书,她好像感受到我的目光,有一点不好意思,装模作样拿出一本英语书开始Abanda,Abanda,Abanda.早读结束,老刘一行人跑过来喊我同桌吃早饭顺便问我去不去,我站起身跟他们一起,第一次跟一帮人去吃早饭,不知道的还以为要打群架呢,值得注意的是,我发现这个同桌在他们面前特别活泼,总是被老老刘讲笑话逗得花枝乱颤。我也是第一次知道,原来女孩子也是可以被逗笑的,这也太可爱了,当时心里就想,要是我也能和她关系这么好就好了。然后当天晚上下晚自习,我同桌突然找到我,问我是不是每天早上都起的很早,我说也不是啊,咋了,然后她跟我说昨天晚上看小说有点晚，今天一天困死了,但是充电宝没有电了,问我能不能帮她给充电宝充电,在早上其他人来之前拔掉,然后可怜巴巴的看着我。这眼神我靠,谁顶得住呀。即便我不愿意早起,但还是接下了这个任务。第二天我5点钟就醒了,不知道为什么,醒来就只记得一件事,去班上取充电宝,然后坐在位子上,等她。很快快到早读了。我同桌卡点进了教室,一坐下我就把充电宝递给她,她看到特别高兴,给我竖了一大拇哥,那以后我每天兢兢业业的给她充电,期待着她拿到充电宝的时候对我展颜一笑,也因为这个,我很快就融入他们这个小团体。接下来每天就是充电宝、早读、上课,晚自习,睡觉,高中生活确实比较枯燥,尤其快高三了,为了备战高考,每天就是两点一线,不过对于那时的我来说,却多了一种盼头，盼望着每天能见到我这个同桌,到了礼拜天上午第四节课,我们班是音乐课，不出意外的话,音乐老师基本上是不会来的。所以都是我们自习,这时候我同桌碰了碰我的手臂。“哎”,“咋了”。“你QQ号多少?”生平第一次有女孩找我要联系方式,然后拿一张纸条写好递给她。“干嘛”?“拉你进我们班群我是管理员”。她说完嘚瑟一下,我说好的,然后给她比了个OK,下午回家第一件事,同意好友申请。中午饭都来不及吃,她网名叫暧昧,后面一堆那个火星文,我一看这网名,同道中人呐,我俩用火星文就聊了起来,聊到快下午三点,她问我要不要去学校,我说你在学校么，她说在看她哥打篮球,有点无聊让我陪她一起,她哥就是老刘,到地方往那一坐,我发现她没有穿校服,一件白色的小裙子,公主风短梨花发型,脑袋后边有个超大的白色蝴蝶结,穿着当时特别流行的某威牌帆布鞋,而且貌似应该是化了点妆,我发誓这是我这辈子看到最好看的女孩子,好看到你不敢跟她对视。“看我干嘛?”“我看你长得好看。”“那还用说。”“嘿…” 在篮球场待了两个多小时,老刘请我喝了瓶饮料,然后就各回各家了。当天晚上闲的翻QQ空间,我看见我同桌发了条说说,是一组照片,显然是下午在篮球场自拍的,下午不敢跟她对视,这照片仔细一看更好看了,当时满脑子在想,为什么我们礼拜天晚上不用晚自习。接下来的日子,我除了学习就是和同桌聊天,慢慢地我也学会了逗她玩啊,总是给她气的掐了大腿,就这样过了一个月。月考结束,老班给我们重新换了座位,小刘同学和我分开了,她旁边坐了另外一个男生,好消息是,每天给她充电宝充电的任务没有被新同桌抢走,但我不知道为什么就莫名其妙看那个男的贼不爽,然后干了一件特别幼稚的事情,我那时候是英语课代表,每回交英语作业的时候,我就把我的放在小组最后边，把她放在小组最上边，我俩作业本贴在一起,真的就是小时候喜欢一个人,连作业本放在一起都觉得好幸福。但是后来我的占有欲越来越强,光是作业本贴贴已经无法满足我了,我找到老刘,让他教我打篮球,因为小刘设事会去篮球场观战,我要想尽一切办法在她面前刷存在感,用老刘的原话就是,那时候我就像一只开屏的孔雀,疯狂展示羽毛,但是我们之间的关系也仅仅止步于此了。哥们怂啊,不敢表白,我怕一表白连朋友都做不成了,只能在心里偷偷暗恋人家,写的情书也不敢给人看。转眼间就到了第二年夏天,这一年哥们还是不敢表白,并且由于距离和高考的原因,我和小刘同学和互动也变少了,就是空下来的时候给她写写情书,我原本以为我们之间的关系就这样了,一直到高中毕业,然后各自奔赴各自的人生。那天是晚自习,我作业写完了,突然才思泉涌,拿出我的小本本开始写情书,写着写着,原本热闹的班级突然安静下来,然后感觉我的脖子凉飕飕的,回头一看,坏了,班主任微微一笑,向我伸出手。“拿来，啧啧,快高考了,写这些东西,你别说写的还挺好,你语文作文要是有这水平,至于只考90多吗。”我当时低着头,一句话都不想说。“嗯,写的不错,大家应该听一听,念吧,不念都别下课。”我偷偷看向小刘,我发现她也在看着我,然后深呼吸一口气,死就死吧，接过我的小本本。
“亲爱的小刘同学,”这句话说完,全班同学“哦～～”，小刘羞得脸都红了。”谈及你,是密密麻麻,却一纸空白,是心慌慌,只字未提，却滔滔不绝。”然后又是一阵,“哦～～”“喜欢你什么呢,我说不上来,也许是午后昏暗教室里,我睁开朦胧的睡眼,你打量我的目光,也许是夏日的操场上,我故意惹你生气,你笑骂着追着我的身影,也许是课后的篮球馆里,惊艳了我整个人生的那一席白衣,我试图用一些漂亮的句子来形容你,但是不行,我字字推敲,写出长长一段话,你眉眼一弯，熠熠生辉,就让我觉得,不行,这些文字写不出你眼里的星辰,写不出你唇角的春风。无论哪个词,都及不上你的半分惊艳。”念完之后,全班鸦雀无声,小刘直接把脸埋在书后边。“嗯,写得不错,也是高三了,我懒得管你,但是希望你谈恋爱归谈恋爱,不要影响成绩,一旦我发现你退步了,我就要找你和你的小刘同学,OK吗?”我当时如释重负,“OK,OK”,“下课吧。”同学陆陆续续离开教室,我却没有要走的意思,哪怕我脸皮再厚,此刻也不敢和人群一起走出去。很快班上就只剩下我和一直低看头的小刘,还有她哥,老刘瞪着我,一脸自家白菜被猪拱了的那眼神,我不敢抬头看他,这时候小刘说:“哥,你先走吧。”“不是什么”老刘显然是没有想到他妹妹居然是这个反应,“等下我自己回去”老刘拗不过,临走之前又狠狠瞪了我一眼,老刘走后,小刘缓缓走到我面前,向我伸出手,“我能看看吗。”我把我那份写满情书的小本本递给她,“写多久了？” “有快一年了吧。”她收起小本本,揣到口袋里,然后跟我说“走吧”,“啊,去哪”“送我回宿舍”“哦。”路过她课桌的时候,她顺手拿了个盒子出来,然后我俩就走在去女生宿舍的路上,我就莫名感受到气氛有一点暖昧,她把我的情书揣到了自己口袋里,通过这个行为分析来看,哥们这事吧,应该是成了,但是我又不确定,怎么办,先试探一下,我就想去牵她手,想是这么想,就根本不敢动。这时候她好像看出了什么,主动拉起我的手。“想牵就牵”,兄弟们,就两只手扣在一起的时候,十指连心啊,一瞬间有一股电流经过我的全身,感觉心里痒痒的，牵一下50,我恨得牙痒痒。“我这个人有很多缺点,像天上的星星一样。”“我知道,但我得告诉你个秘密。“什么秘密？”“你也有优点呢,只不过少得跟太阳一样。”“那你喜欢我干嘛。”“因为太阳一出来,星星就不见了。”她可能被我这句话整得有点不知所措,然后我就看着她一直拿着那盒子,有点好奇,“这啥？”,她直接把盒子递给我,“唉,本来是买给我哥的鞋,但你这么一说,现在他不配，归你了”,我有点懵,无动于忠，“这最近流行的APP得物上买的都是鉴别正品,根据我对你的观察,你肯定喜欢。”“这不行,我跟你表白,我啥也没送你,你还送我一双鞋?不行不行不行”她笑了笑,拿出一支笔,在鞋面上写下,“大阳和小刘”,“这下行了吧。”,不是你这,多不好意思。”“再告诉你个秘密吧,你每次看着我的时候,眼睛里都是星星,一闪一闪的。”说着她看着我越来越近然后缓缓闭上了眼睛。接下来……反正反正,哥们的初吻就这样没了。
那天过后,我俩也成了班上公认的一对情侣,我们也约好要一直一起走下去,确实在朝着这个方向努力,以至于后来班主任都拿我俩开玩笑。
日子就这样一天天过去,眼看快要高考了,那天晚上我在宿舍复习,看到老刘穿起衣服跟我说查寝了,帮他打掩护,和几个别的寝室的人一起走了。大半夜应该是混出学校玩去了,看着他离开的背影,我突然觉得不能再这样下去了，我和小刘已经步入正轨了,我想让老刘也好好读书,他如果再这样下去的话,很可能大学都考不上,所以那天晚上老师来查寝的时候。我没有帮他,结果,第二天老师就把老刘的父亲叫到学校,本身对老刘学习已经失望顶的刘爸,听到儿子在校违反校规勃然大怒,老刘可能也是一肚子气,当场和他爸起了争执,俩人吵了起来,最终老刘退学了,甚至小刘也受到了牵连。我记得老刘回宿舍收拾东习走的时候,找其他人一起吃了个饭,消息是小刘告诉我的,她说他哥可能是给我忘了喊我一起去,可我知道真正的原因并不是这个,我当时想半天决定一起过去给他道个歉。老刘见到我,意味深长的看了我很久,我到现在都忘不了那个眼神,然后他站起来,给除了我以外的所有人都倒了杯饮料,喝完就走了。马上就高考了,他不想学就不学吗,有什么关系,我但凡不这么多管闲事,事情也不至于发展到这种地步。那天以后,我从人人羡慕的模范男友,变成人人避犹不及的告状精,班主任的走狗,全班人都不愿意靠近我,甚至连小刘也不怎么跟我说话了。最终,我也离开学校去了外地打工,哪怕小刘中途联系过我好几次,我也没有回去,我们之间的感情,仓促的开始,也这样仓促的结束。
——十年后——
当年那双小刘送我的鞋,我穿了很久,但还是不可避免的穿坏了,我就在得物上买了双一模一样的,看着这个APP变成现在的得物,还是一如既往的蓝色包装,甚至在今天,这款8年前的鞋子也断断续续的有货,就像我对她,任时光飞逝,这份感情一直埋在我的心里。想到这里,我打了个电话。“你突然找到我,就为了送双鞋?”“那不睹物思人吗,这么久不见了,想你了呗。”“哼,想我就和我妹和好。”“别扯了,我高中都没毕业,人家大学生。”“她追了你这么多年,你觉得她在乎这些吗?“我不能不在乎””要我说你这人脑子就不正常。”“我找你来就叙叙旧。”“你说当年我留下来是不是就不会这样了?”“也许吧。”“那既然如此,你当年有胆子当着全班人的面,把你这个情书念出来,为什么现在没有胆子跟人家和好。”“老刘”“嗯”“我今年26了,没车没房,每个月的工资要偿换上个月的借贷,十年前的我,意气风发,十年后的我,狗屁不是,混得一塌糊涂。她今年24,正是一个女人最美好的年纪,我何德何能,让她把她人生中最宝贵的时光,浪费在我的身上。”“什么时候走?”“马上。”“等会吧。”
“好久不见。”“好久不见。”“行了,回去吧。”“你几点的飞机啊?”“十点”,“那我们还能再待两个小时。”“准确来说是一个小时,待会还得上飞机,咋的,舍不得我走啊?”“快滚。”“这么绝情吗?”“那我换一个,还会回来吗燕子”,“不是,你神经病啊。师傅开车吧!”“哈哈哈……”,“那你还会回来吗?算了,拿着路上玩吧,解闷的。”“对不起。”“再见时要幸福啊燕子。”“你也是。”“走啦。”
“大傻阳,你摸我屁股干什么?”“大傻阳,你摸我屁股干什么?”“哈喽哈喽,也不知道你能不能听到,不过你既然已经听到这段话,那说明我们最后还是没有走到一起,有点可惜。有的时候我看着身边的人一个个结婚,真的好羡慕啊，我甚至想象过我们在一起的日子,就在我们老家,有钱没钱无所谓,有个能住的地方就好了,白天的时候我们一起出去上班,到了晚上,如果高兴的话呢，我就骑着小电驴去买菜,为你准备一桌丰盛的大餐,你要是惹我生气,那我就惩罚你,晚上只有一碗清水煮面,嗯,算喽,给你加点肉丝吧,省得你说我虐待你,礼拜天呢,哎,你不是喜欢打游戏吗,我就在家里买两台电脑，买一堆零食和饮料,然后陪你一起玩,晚上,晚上再喝点小酒……”

entry.title: 睡前闲笔
entry.content:
睡前闲笔

在11月末12月初 这段时间，我开始捣鼓起多端同步，最开始是同步iCloud书签，先下载iCloud客户端然后又是浏览器插件 反反复复两端书签都没有任何变化 不知所因 可能是时间等的不够 也可能网络问题 反正最后烂尾。再之后就是iOS与Windows实现信息快传 网页接力 我借助Bark应用和ahk脚本及shortcut指令勉强实现了功能。在ahk脚本的使用之前 我想windows可通过get或post请求发消息到iOS 那反之又该如何 进而想到mysql存取和显示信息 于是就着手于php连接mysql nodejs等网页开发 水平还是不够 有的功能不能实现 偶然发现一个新闻信息管理系统模版 通过表单执行action php 来操作mysql 经过大量测试 没有问题 但还是不太便捷 新鲜感过去 就很少使用 转而ahk脚本。
没有量的积累 哪有质的飞跃
今天晚上再一次提交了iPhone_BARK（upgrade）程序 comment是这样写的“Provide more beautiful Main_Page UI。Add some func such as Sound Group （Archive）” 看着日趋完善的程序和逐渐丰富的功能 我很激动 虽然求助了不少chatgpt 也套用了不少模版 但程序思想 及逻辑操作都是我构建的 UI操作也是我设计的 谈不上高大上 却绝无仅有 That’s it 想到这个程序的雏形只是我在Ubuntu上测试Bark 可视化get请求 发送信息的tkinter demo 到现在麻雀虽小 五脏俱全 确实印证前面那句：“没有量的积累，哪有质的飞跃？”
现在咖啡是刚需，对我来说，咖啡和每天喝的茶 吃的饭一样必不可少，可惜一方面咖啡难买（不是没钱买 而是真的我不愿亲自去买）另一方面，在毛坦厂这样的小镇 咖啡的品质也变得和奶茶一样 那么的随意和廉价（不是说咖啡就必须喝贵的 但是你说咖啡和小糖水一个味算是咖啡吗）一直很想买咖啡机 可是求之不得。
花了昨天一下午和晚上及今天上午的时间我将初中时期的日记拷贝到OneNote中 虽然不知道有什么意义 但我必须去做。
在此记录📝这些天的所做所为

entry.title: First
entry.content:
First
今天晚上我很不开心，主要是在晚上，晚上时，我的水笔芯快慢慢没有了，这根是在张家港大超市里买到的，我认为十分的顺畅，而且书写不刮纸，可是用了一段时间，笔芯已经用完一支了，另一支也快用完了。可惜这根笔芯十分难找，于是我准备用淘宝软件里买，可惜寻找了半天也没有找到那种笔芯。就在我想泄气的时候，突然屏上显示了一款。我抱着试试看的态度点开一看，呵，还真是哪一款笔芯呢/我死磨硬泡着叫妈妈给我买，妈妈却说在看过实体店确定没有后再给我买，我大叫，结果被某个人打了，我想你们也不知道吧？之后，我准备去洗澡，爸爸却说叫我洗快一点，于是我便让爸爸先洗澡，可是他不干，还骂了我一顿，是不是太亏了。

This today night i am so unhappy, mainly is on nights, my water pen’s core is

entry.title: Time keeps going by. I can’t keep anything
entry.content:

entry.title: How to resolve the problem of debug is paused
entry.content:
How to resolve the problem of debug is paused

Today I started a new coding task: the spider of movie but when I pressed F12 to debug web and find m3u8 files,this web popped a window “debug is paused” and jumped towards resource of function, I pressed the button of pause and doesn’t work, at the same time I follow the steps of I learned from CSDN blog “Right click the lines number of function and select the option Never ...breakpoint” the result is because too much loops to let this web non response I can’t get I want
Finally I try again from PC with chrome and click a button this time all is done I can get the file of m3u8 named “mixed.m3u8” now everything is well

entry.title: Shit
entry.content:
Shit

国内的互联网应用环境 我实在不敢恭维 且不说会员重复消费（电视机顶盒平台）也不说一些office应用太过臃肿，处理一些word 表格 最多还有ppt不就得了么 又加什么C盘瘦身 看图之类的 你要不说是office工具我还以为是什么呢 各种右键菜单选项乱加 也不思考用户是否需要。再不说一些云盘下载限速（好好好，限速就限速吧，毕竟没有开会员么）但是其中一款网盘你别太离谱（下载进度还有0.1%的时候到完成比我前面下载99.9%花的时间还多 进度条难做就别做了 眼不见心不烦 弄个假的 看的难受死了。
会员机制也几乎没有像国外大部分App的买断制 钱花的不明不白的。回归到应用臃肿问题 查看AppData中一些Ten系应用 其中占空间最大的是一些Plgin文件夹 像什么OCR 看图 等插件 确实没有多大用处 如果非要增加这些 不如集成到应用中 或将其迁移到安装根目录 不要动不动就放在AppData目录 你看大部分国外应用 他的App文件目录非常的整洁 至少我知道 哪些文件夹做什么 Config Dll-Dynamic Link Library cache 都非常清晰明了
还有自动更新及开机自启问题 刚安装完应用 各种权限索取 我将这种行为称之为电脑使用权转移 自动更新就罢了 更新安装应用安置竟然重设为Local文件夹中 但凡你放在program files里我都不说

Translation: I really don’t dare to compliment the domestic Internet application environment, not to mention the repeated consumption of members (TV set-top box platform) and some office applications are too bloated. It’s enough to deal with some word forms and at most have ppt, and add C disk slimming, look at pictures and so on. I thought what the office tool was? All kinds of right-click menu options are added randomly, and I don’t think about whether users need them. Not to mention some cloud disk download speed limit (okay, let’s limit the speed limit, after all, you don’t have a membership), but don’t be too ridiculous for one of the network disks (when the download progress is still 0.1%, it takes more than 99.9% of the time to complete the previous download. If the progress bar is difficult to do, don’t do it. Don’t do it without seeing or mind. Make a fake It’s so uncomfortable to watch.

The membership mechanism is almost not as unclear as the buyout money of most foreign apps. Return to the bloated application problem. Check some Ten-based applications in AppData, which take up the most space. Some Plgin folders, such as OCR, look at the pictures and other plug-ins are really not very useful. If you have to add these, it is better to integrate them into the application or migrate them to the installation root. Record. Don’t put it in the AppData directory at any time. You can see that most foreign applications. His App file directory is very neat. At least I know which folders do what Config Dll-Dynamic Link Library cache is not It’s always clear

There are also automatic update and self-starting problems. Just after installing the application, various permissions are requested. I call this behavior the transfer of computer rights. It’s just automatic update. The update and installation application is reset to the Local folder, but I don’t say anything you put it in program files. I think the application best behavior is keep it helpful powerful and small size is really important, save the most core function and delete some common function. Return to the question of that office app is too large, this app core func is processes the word excel and PowerPoint, Absolutely I can use Microsoft Office so it need to improve its feature of func make sure it is different between Microsoft Office and itself. Such as photo viewer, C disk slime haven’t any usage but just make the app size lagger

entry.title: Day One Essentials Guide
entry.content:
Day One Essentials Guide

Welcome to Day One, we’re glad you’re here. If you’re wondering what you can do with your new journal, you’ve come to the right place. Below are a few of the features we believe will help you get the most out of Day One.

  1. ​Photos​: Journal your favorite photos and say goodbye to the days of having your best shots get lost in the camera roll. Tap the Photo button on the home screen to add your first photo.
  2. ​Prompts​: With a unique daily prompt, you never have to wonder “what should I write?” again. Tap the + (New) button on the home screen to find today’s prompt.
  3. ​Today​: See your calendar events, location history, and photos all in one place to quickly recap your day in a summarized entry. Swipe right from the side of the home screen to access Today.
  4. ​Privacy​: For your eyes only, the way a journal should be. Entries are encrypted, plus you can use Touch ID or Face ID to add an additional level of protection.
  5. Unlimited Entries Day One is a journal that’s impossible to fill up, but we encourage you to try. Tap the Text button on the home screen to create your first text entry.

Looking to do even more with your journal? Here are five of our favorite ​Premium features​:

  1. ​Video​: Become the director of your own highlight reel. Record video straight from Day One or add clips up to 5 minutes long from your camera roll.
  2. ​Audio​: With audio recording, you can literally give your journal a voice—yours. Record with or without transcription.
  3. ​Secure Sync​: Start an entry on one device, finish on another. It’s magic your thumbs will thank you for.
  4. ​Instagram Importer​: Our slick importer tool automatically pulls (past and future) photos and videos from your Instagram account into Day One.
  5. ​Cloud Backup​: Cloud backup gives you peace of mind that no matter what happens to your device, your entries are safe and sound on our secure servers.

Want to give Premium a try? Tap here to start a free trial and gain access to the complete Day One Journal experience.

Need more help getting started? Our help guides cover just about every topic and are accessible from the Settings menu right inside the Day One app.
